bug.summary: Altair grouped bar chart demo doesn't display
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
The Altair grouped bar chart demo (<denchmark-link:https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/grouped_bar_chart.html>https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/grouped_bar_chart.html</denchmark-link> ) doesn't work on streamlit. Instead of displaying a graphic, nothing is displayed when it is passed into . <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
import streamlit as st import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
source = data.barley()
chart = ( alt.Chart(source) .mark_bar() .encode(x="year:O", y="sum(yield):Q", color="year:N", column="site:N") )
st.write(chart) <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: Streamlit, version 0.48.1 Python version: Python 3.7.4 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? conda OS version: MacOS 10.14.6 Browser version: Chrome 77.0.3865.120, no ad blockers
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
Thanks for looking into it!

comments.comment: Seems to work now! Upgrade streamlit and try this again. Apologies for our delay in response. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98836/74492656-77c0e000-4e84-11ea-9e96-129a608ffcb4.png></denchmark-link>
